ygData.messageBody:
I am sorry, it appears that my last post asking questions about the skills
"sneaking and hiding" did not come over clearly to the mailing list.� I had
put the skill names "sneaking and hiding" in the subject, then proceeded to
ask questions about them in the body of the email.� It turns out, no one saw
the subject and my message looked rather silly.� Please forgive my waste of
everyone's time.
�
Now, to the questions!
�
I have built a Halfling Druid, and have the abilities of "Sneak" and "Hide."
�
These are not listed as "trainable" at any level, yet I can use them as an
"ability" it seems.� Sort of like "Bash" for a Barbarian (or 'slam').
�
I am very curious about these abilities.� If anyone knows, please tell me
your experience with them.� In particular, I'm interested to know:
�
1) Do these skills ever go "up" in effectiveness?
�
2) How do I know if I was successful in using the skill?� Hiding, for
example "always" seems to work, yet still I get whacked!
�
3) Where would I go to "train" in them if this is possible?
�
Travis
�
